item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, November 20, 2024 at 10:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Foursquare Open Source Places: A new foundational dataset (51 points | 1 comment)
2. Tiny Glade 'built' its way to >600k sold in a month (319 points | 72 comments)
3. Let's Encrypt is 10 years old now (259 points | 92 comments)
4. Understanding the BM25 full text search algorithm (101 points | 5 comments)
5. Webvm: Virtual Machine for the Web (153 points | 43 comments)
6. Epic Allows Internet Archive to Distribute Unreal and Unreal Tournament Forever (359 points | 83 comments)
7. SpaceX Super Heavy splashes down in the gulf, canceling chopsticks landing (229 points | 323 comments)
8. Meta Uses LLMs to Improve Incident Response (110 points | 11 comments)
9. Blender 4.3 (164 points | 54 comments)
10. Using Erlang hot code updates (222 points | 43 comments)
11. 1-Bit AI Infrastructure (57 points | 5 comments)
12. Yhangry (YC W22) Is Hiring 2 Mid-Level Full-Stack Engineers ( | hide)
13. Using uv with PyTorch (145 points | 38 comments)
14. Yi Peng 3 crossed both cables C-Lion 1 and BSC at times matching when they broke (76 points | 31 comments)
15. Tiling with Three Polygons Is Undecidable (78 points | 15 comments)
16. Open Riak – open, modern Riak fork (161 points | 58 comments)
17. Query Your Python Lists (37 points | 9 comments)
18. Show HN: Physically accurate black hole simulation using your iPhone camera (264 points | 105 comments)
19. Why I hate the index finger (1980) (188 points | 68 comments)
20. Hand Tracking for Mouse Input (178 points | 44 comments)
21. Recycled Server Components Bring More Sustainability (23 points | 6 comments)
22. Nickel Plating Handbook [pdf] (27 points | 7 comments)
23. Bottles of OOP now available in Python (155 points | 36 comments)
24. Nominal for Storing, Structural for Manipulating (24 points | 12 comments)
25. Unified Checkout: Streamlining Uber's Payment Ecosystem (16 points | discuss)
26. Trivial REST server in various languages to compare (6 points | 4 comments)
27. Launch HN: Regatta Storage (YC F24) – Turn S3 into a local-like, POSIX cloud FS (561 points | 305 comments)
28. Apple Confirms Zero-Day Attacks Hitting macOS Systems (220 points | 74 comments)
29. Why don't you move abroad? (105 points | 73 comments)
30. The Data Engineering Handbook (156 points | 13 comments)
